On november 19, 2012
kiwiluke

From HelpLAST MAN STANDING AWARDS TABLE
dead during day 5 (between 0h et 23h59) or before = no award

dead during the night between day 5 and 6 = 1 hero day + distinction

dead during the night between day 6 and 7 = 2 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 7 and 8 = 3 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 8 and 9 = 4 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 9 and 10 = 5 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 10 and 15 = 6 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 15 and 20 = 7 hero days + distinction

dead during the night between day 20 and 21 or thereafter = 10 hero days + distinction

HC gives twice as many days so you will actually get 12 hero days,

didn't even pay attention to that fact until Harry pointed it out
